env GO111MODULE=on
env GOPROXY=direct

# Testing that git export-subst is disabled
[!net:github.com] skip
[!git] skip
go build

-- x.go --
package x

import _ "github.com/jasonkeene/export-subst"

-- go.mod --
module x
